lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Wednesday about the possibility of changes to the Mets’ pitching staff misstated the statistics for Jon Niese, a minor league prospect in the organization. At the time of the report, he was 3-1 with a 3.12 earned run average at Class AAA New Orleans — not 6-7 with a 3.04 E.R.A., which were his earlier statistics at Class AA Binghamton.
